/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the glow of a bright sun. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The road itself is a vibrant blue, marked with white lines that guide the flow of traffic. 

On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the unseen wind. They line the street, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and shapes fill the background, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Among them, a tall skyscraper stands out, reaching towards the clear blue sky.

The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light. Despite the absence of people in the image, one can almost feel the hum of city life just by looking at it. It's a snapshot of a moment, frozen in time, yet full of energy and movement.
